function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","Impact":"Inadequate disaster deployment and mitigation protocols, leading to increased risk of disease spread in built environments.","Mitigation":"Incorporate pandemic classification and recognition into disaster deployment protocols and academic teaching activities.","Technologies":"Integration of pandemic analytics and modeling tools into urban planning and architectural design software.","People":"Urban planning and architectural professional institutions, students, and occupants of built environments.","Owner":"Institutions and professionals in urban planning and architecture."}]}
